Text.Page:
Know I can trust you, at least. I'm sure Licinza's a spy. Report a spy, they go to jail. But TRAP a spy and you can use them! I can deal with Licinza, but the cult spymaster {@LinkCreature:17#205#Vilastasia} will figure out about the ledger.

So we kill him. Yes! Perfect. Protect the secret and the spy. Think you can do it?

Good soldier! Now we send their raiders where we want!

Winning wars is all about logistics and intelligence. , you just helped us with both.
